This project received funding from the Academic Forum for the Study of Gambling (AFSG) in April 2025. The project is led by Dr. Christopher Wilson and Co-investigators Dr. Srdan Medimorec, Dr. Robert Portman, Dr. Judith Eberhardt. Hannah Poulter (Bristol) is also collaborating on this project.

Details of the project are available on the [AFSG website](https://afsg.org/2025/04/30/exploratory-grant-award-winners-2025/).
